seo: Zookeeper,未授权访问,端口扫描,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测Zookeeper服务的未授权访问漏洞，通过连接目标端口并发送特定命令来确认是否存在漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect unauthorized access vulnerabilities in Zookeeper services by connecting to the target port and sending specific commands to confirm the existence of vulnerabilities.
